author: agemanning
content:
When I was looking at the topics scores, my understanding was that as long as the topic was in here: https://github.com/libp2p/go-libp2p-pubsub/blob/master/score_params.go#L54 
It will get scored. 
Seems you can set this here: https://github.com/libp2p/go-libp2p-pubsub/blob/master/gossipsub.go#L205
So , for go, can you just add all the topics to the peer score params?

author: nishant0
content:
Yeah you could also do that, but the issue would necessitate adding params for all possible topics at node start. Also it is a bit wierd to have to set the params of a topic you arent subscribed to and may never be subsribed to.

 Was hoping there would be something nicer, if not i would just go that way.

author: agemanning
content: Yeah, my plan is to build a default set which will be applied to all topics we subscribe to

content: that sounds good, how close is rust-libp2p to v1.1 ?
